fr.upmc.datacenter.software.applicationvm.interfaces

Interface ApplicationVMIntrospectionI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationVMIntrospectionConnector, ApplicationVMIntrospectionInboundPort, ApplicationVMIntrospectionOutboundPort

    public interface ApplicationVMIntrospectionI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The class ApplicationVMIntrospectionI defines the component services to introspect applicaiton virtual machines.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : October 5, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
